00027 /*! \file healpix_map_fitsio.h

00031 
00032 #ifndef HEALPIX_MAP_FITSIO_H
00033 #define HEALPIX_MAP_FITSIO_H
00034 
00035 #include <string>
00036 
00037 class fitshandle;
00038 class Healpix_Base;
00039 
00040 template<typename T> class arr;
00041 template<typename T> class Healpix_Map;
00042 
00043 /*! \defgroup healpix_map_fitsio_group FITS-based I/O of HEALPix maps */
00044 /*! \{ */
00045 
00046 /*! Reads the map stored in column \a colnum of the FITS binary table
00047     pointed to by \a inp into \a map. */
00048 template<typename T> void read_Healpix_map_from_fits
00049   (fitshandle &inp, Healpix_Map<T> &map, int colnum=1);
00050 /*! Opens the FITS file \a filename, jumps to the HDU \a hdunum,
00051     and reads the column \a colnum into \a map. */
00052 template<typename T> void read_Healpix_map_from_fits
00053   (const std::string &filename, Healpix_Map<T> &map, int colnum=1,
00054   int hdunum=2);
00055 
00056 /*! Inserts a new binary table into \a out, which contains one column
00057     of FITS type \a datatype with the name \a name, and writes all HEALPix
00058     specific keywords based on the information in \a base. */
00059 void prepare_Healpix_fitsmap
00060   (fitshandle &out, const Healpix_Base &base, int datatype,
00061   const arr<std::string> &colname);
00062 
00063 /*! Inserts a new binary table into \a out, which contains one column
00064     of FITS type \a datatype, and stores \a map into this column. */
00065 template<typename T> void write_Healpix_map_to_fits
00066   (fitshandle &out, const Healpix_Map<T> &map, int datatype);
00067 /*! Inserts a new binary table into \a out, which contains three columns
00068     of FITS type \a datatype, and stores \a mapT, \a mapQ and \a mapU
00069     into these columns. */
00070 template<typename T> void write_Healpix_map_to_fits
00071   (fitshandle &out, const Healpix_Map<T> &mapT,
00072    const Healpix_Map<T> &mapQ, const Healpix_Map<T> &mapU, int datatype);
00073 
00074 /*! \} */
00075 
00076 #endif
